{"id":1224607472,"question_id":3,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"1 week, 3 days","timestamp":1712387324,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"6 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1224607472/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Longest Substring Without Repeating Characters","memory":"45.1 MB","code":"import java.util.HashSet;\n\nclass Solution {\n    public int lengthOfLongestSubstring(String s) {\n        HashSet<Character> set = new HashSet<>();\n        int max = 0;\n        int start = 0; // Start index of the current substring\n\n        for (int end = 0; end < s.length(); end++) {\n            char c = s.charAt(end);\n            // If the character is already in the set, remove characters from the set until the repeated character is removed\n            while (set.contains(c)) {\n                set.remove(s.charAt(start));\n                start++; // Move the start index forward to exclude the repeated character\n            }\n            // Add the current character to the set\n            set.add(c);\n            // Update the maximum length if needed\n            max = Math.max(max, end - start + 1);\n        }\n\n        return max;\n    }\n}\n","compare_result":"","title_slug":"longest-substring-without-repeating-characters","has_notes":true,"flag_type":1}
